value: This guy looks familiar.
This is Victor. We've seen him in Aeros.
Ah, it's the man who was talking to the father at that time.
You shouldn't have come, I only need the mongrel one.
But now you all will die.
Dimitrius will be happy I had to do his dirty work.
Why? What do you want from me?
Nothing, you just seem to have something I need.
Damn you look weak.
Eh? I don't understand.
You don't? Haven't you been visiting the dragon lately?
Uncle Qothus?..
That's its name?
Sorry, I don't take note how my prey was called.
What?..
You have...
Yes, I slayed it.
Why?
*Sigh* Why do men hunt?
To dominate. To feed. To feel joy.
And also to test himself.
You killed Uncle Qothus!
Calm down, Ember!
Yeah, save yourself some energy for the fight.
So you test yourself by challenging some girl who looks weak and killing time-worn dragons?
Hmph. You have a sharp tongue boy.
But you are right, it's not much of a test.
So what's your deal?
Do you know about dragon souls?
More or less.
I've been collecting them for long years. It seems one was hiding by your side.
And I presume you'd get something by getting them all.
Strength. Immortality. Power. You name it.
A reward worthy of a supreme warrior.
And it all lies within my grasp now.
The only reason I'm telling you about this is  your death looms.
I'm sick of this psycho. He deserves some retribution.
